articles.title: Migrants aided by Belarus try to push across Polish border - NPR
articles.description: A large group of migrants sought to push their way over the border from Belarus into Poland. European Union leaders accuse the Belarusian government of organizing the illegal passage of migrants.
articles.content:
Migrants from the Middle East and elsewhere break down the fence as they gather at the Belarus-Poland border near Grodno, Belarus on Monday.
Leonid Shcheglov/BelTA via AP
WARSAW, Poland Hundreds if… [+5712 chars]

articles.author: Derek Scally
articles.title: Fourth wave of Covid triggers restriction demands across Europe - The Irish Times
articles.description: WHO warns Europe in danger of losing another 500,000 lives to virus by February
articles.content: European leaders from Copenhagen to Prague are under growing pressure to reintroduce tighter Covid-19 measures across the board or targeting the unvaccinated amid a surge in new infections across the… [+4424 chars]
